text: (nabiye!) oba mese pavasanu: “minisune! niyata vasayenma obage deviyange sannidhanayenma mema satya dharmaya oba veta pæmina ætteya. kavurun (meya anugamanaya kara), rju margayehima gaman karanneda ohu, tamange yahapata sandahama (ema) rju margayehi yanneya. kavurun (meya anugamanaya nokara) margaya værada yanneda, ohu, niyata vasayenma tamanta napuru margayehima yanneya. tavada ma obava (bala kara) paripalanaya kirime balaya læbu keneku nova
